trans-unit.source: Represents a column of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coluna de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridViewComboBoxColumn é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>usado para logicamente células de host que permitem que os usuários selecionem valores de uma lista de opções.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewComboBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um DataGridViewComboBoxColumn tem um associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>que intercepta proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the cells manually by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode preencher as células manualmente definindo suas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode associar a coluna para a fonte de dados indicada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a database table, set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of a column in the table.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está associada a uma tabela de banco de dados, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade para o nome de uma coluna na tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a collection of objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está associado a uma coleção de objetos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade para o nome de uma propriedade de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode preencher a lista suspensa de coluna manualmente adicionando valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode associar a lista suspensa para sua própria fonte de dados, definindo a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores são objetos em uma coleção ou registros em uma tabela de banco de dados, você também deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade indica qual coluna de propriedade ou o banco de dados de objeto fornece os valores que são exibidos na lista suspensa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade indica qual coluna de banco de dados ou de propriedade do objeto é usada para definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: One typical scenario is to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário típico é associar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar para uma tabela de banco de dados principal e associar a lista suspensa para uma tabela filho relacionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar para uma `Orders` tabela que contém um `ProductID` coluna e a coluna do conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade para um `Products` tabela que contém `ProductID` e `ProductName` colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you would set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, você poderia definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>"ProductID" para popular seus valores de célula da propriedade de `Orders.ProductID` coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property to "ProductID" and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property to "ProductName".
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para exibir os nomes de produto real em células e a lista suspensa, você deve mapear esses valores para o `Products` tabela definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade como "ProductID" e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade como "ProductName".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property) must include the actual cell values or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de lista suspensa (ou os valores indicados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade) deve incluir os valores de célula reais ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle lançará uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>Propriedades define automaticamente as propriedades correspondentes de todas as células na coluna incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir os valores de propriedade para células específicas, defina a propriedade da coluna primeiro e, em seguida, defina as propriedades de célula.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> does not have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>não tem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, selecionando um valor de uma lista suspensa define a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de classificação padrão para esse tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe para o estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ao inicializar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>esse construtor de instância, define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as células na coluna corresponderão aos caracteres sendo inseridos na célula com uma das seleções possíveis.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto completion is activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o preenchimento automático está ativado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo usado para criar células.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>classe inicializa essa propriedade como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> recém-criado</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface do usuário (UI) de células existentes da coluna.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Essas alterações são aparentes somente depois que a coluna for gerado novamente (por exemplo, ao classificar a coluna ou por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todas as outras células na coluna são modeladas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ao configurar essa propriedade como um valor que não é do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para duplicar uma coluna de células.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte de dados que preenche as seleções para as caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>propriedades especificam onde deseja recuperar os dados de seleção mostrados na lista suspensa da caixa de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the DataSource property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar a propriedade de fonte de dados, se os dados devem ser definidos de uma propriedade não padrão ou uma coluna, em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como o nome da propriedade não padrão ou coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource property is set to a string array, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade DataSource está definida para uma matriz de cadeia de caracteres, em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>não precisa ser definida porque cada cadeia de caracteres da matriz será usada para o valor e exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres que especifica a propriedade ou coluna da qual recuperar cadeias de caracteres para exibição nas caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The data for the values stored in a column of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> objects is obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para os valores armazenados em uma coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>objetos é obtido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the DisplayMember property must be set to the necessary property name or column name.
trans-unit.target: Se esses dados vierem de uma propriedade não padrão ou uma coluna, a propriedade DisplayMember deve ser definida para o nome de propriedade necessários ou o nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use DisplayMember and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores de célula são valores internos não é visíveis para o usuário, em seguida, usar DisplayMember e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>para mapear os valores de célula interno para valores visíveis ao usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the DisplayMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>estiver definida como uma matriz de cadeia de caracteres, a propriedade DisplayMember não precisa ser definida porque cada cadeia de caracteres da matriz será usada como uma cadeia de caracteres de exibição válido e um valor base válido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome de uma propriedade ou coluna na fonte de dados especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina como a caixa de combinação é exibida quando não editando.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayStyle property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DisplayStyle afeta a aparência das células na coluna quando forem não está no modo de edição e independentemente se eles são somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma célula está em modo de edição, sempre parece um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property value is `false`, the DisplayStyle property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the DisplayStyle property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>é o valor da propriedade `false`, a propriedade DisplayStyle afeta todas as células na coluna; caso contrário, a propriedade DisplayStyle afeta apenas a célula atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento e a aparência da seta suspensa nas células é indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the DisplayStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar o realce de célula quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre uma célula, você deve definir a propriedade DisplayStyle e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref> value indicating the combo box appearance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref> valor que indica a aparência da caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*> property value applies only to the current cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control when the current cell is in this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>o valor da propriedade se aplica somente para a célula atual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar quando a célula atual é nesta coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>

trans-unit.source: If the DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly property value is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta todas as células na coluna; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta apenas a célula atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta a aparência das células na coluna quando forem não está no modo de edição e independentemente se eles são somente leitura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma célula está em modo de edição, sempre parece um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estilo de exibição só se aplica a célula atual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura das listas suspensas de caixa de combinação de caixas.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>membro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, das listas suspensas.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a aparência de estilo plano das células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FlatStyle afeta o comportamento e a aparência das setas suspensas para as células nesta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], when the FlatStyle property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the FlatStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], quando a propriedade FlatStyle é definida como `Flat` ou `Popup` as setas suspensas são redimensionadas de acordo com as configurações de DPI do sistema quando o arquivo App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` para ativar o realce de célula quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre uma célula, você deve definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>a propriedade FlatStyle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valor que indica a aparência da célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos usados como seleções nas caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Items or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Os itens ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedades são usadas para preencher as seleções de caixas de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If strings are added to Items, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: Se cadeias de caracteres são adicionadas aos itens, em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedades não precisam ser definida porque cada cadeia de caracteres adicionada será usada para o valor e exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>não oferece suporte ao uso de vários itens com valores de exibição idêntico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set, then Items cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>estiver definida, em seguida, itens não podem ser usados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection> that represents the selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>que representa as seleções nas caixas de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de itens na lista suspensa das células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de itens de lista suspensa, de 1 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The default is 8.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 8.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens na caixa de combinação estão classificados.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caixa de combinação está classificada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres que especifica a propriedade ou coluna da qual obter valores que correspondam às seleções na lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> for more information about its relationship with ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>para obter mais informações sobre sua relação com ValueMember.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the ValueMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>estiver definida como uma matriz de cadeia de caracteres, a propriedade ValueMember não precisa ser definida porque cada cadeia de caracteres da matriz será usada como uma cadeia de caracteres de exibição válido e um valor base válido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome de uma propriedade ou coluna usada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
